Package app

Class DistributedCVM

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
app.DistributedCVM
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI
public class DistributedCVM extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
The DistributedCVM class manages the initialization and deployment in multiple jvm of simulation components for a sensor network, including clocks, user interfaces, and the connections between client and sensor components. It inherits from AbstractDistributedCVM and configures various aspects of the component lifecycle, visualization, and clock synchronization. Authors: Malek Bouzarkouna, Younes Chetouani, Amine Zemali

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main entry point to start the component virtual machine, creating an instance of DistributedCVM. This method starts the standard lifecycle of the CVM with a specified duration before shutting down.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used).
